name: Arakata
description:
Made for IGSI game jam

Featuring indonesia's tradition and traditional languange, Sanskerta and Javanese

Story :
The Astrals, the power lust ones, are greedy enough to conquer other worlds. But first, they want to strengthen their position. They seek Yoni, a super-powerful magic item that can give tremendous power to its keeper, held by the “weaklings” of the Real World, The Humans.

Susanto, a member of Arakata, and one of the youngest sacred item keepers found a massage in his house.

“Bring me your stuff. And I will give no harm to your parents”

Note :
- Some spell still in development, but they still can be used anyway.
- We will fix the bugs in the next patch after the vote session ends.
- Escape Key to pause, and space bar to continue the dialogue.
- Press enter when done typing
